ygData.subject: Re: How viable is our class past lev 30?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have to agree with this strategy, I m already seeing how it will work, and if you do in fact cause the mob to frenzy on you and ignore your pet, more
ygData.messageBody:
> DD and DoTs both have pluses and minuses, yet both are incredibly
> powerful. Learn to use it, then you will see.

I have to agree with this strategy, I'm already seeing how it will work, and
if you do in fact cause the mob to frenzy on you and ignore your pet, more
power to ya, if you hit the baddie with a darkness spell you can easily walk
backwards and stay ahead of it, while your DoT spells do their work, and
your pet bashes him from behind, I've killed countless nro mobs using this
technique since making level 12.
